moves.name: Stand LP
moves.notes: Chains into stand LP / crouch LP / crouch LK

moves.name: Stand MP
moves.notes: Has a MP > HP Target Combo follow-up (Bread and Butter combo tool)

moves.name: Stand HP
moves.notes: Strong poke and shimmy tool that's hit confirmable (17F hit confirm window)

moves.name: Stand LK
moves.notes: Pretty good range for a fully cancelable light

moves.name: Stand MK
moves.notes: Good footsie / buffer tool that's fully cancelable

moves.name: Stand HK
moves.notes: Upper body invincible on airborne strikes on frames 10-15

moves.name: Crouch LP
moves.notes: Chains into stand LP / crouch LP / crouch LK

moves.name: Crouch MP
moves.notes: Primary combo / buffer tool

moves.name: Crouch HP
moves.notes: Forces stand on hit

moves.name: Crouch LK
moves.notes: Chains into stand LP / crouch LP / crouch LK

moves.name: Crouch MK
moves.notes: Great frame advantage on hit and block for a crouch MK that enables all sorts of combo and pressure opportunities

moves.name: Crouch HK
moves.notes: Has very strong hitbox priority

moves.name: Jump LP
moves.notes: Quick air-to-air check

moves.name: Jump MP
moves.notes: Puts airborne opponents into a limited juggle state

moves.name: Jump HP
moves.notes: Causes a spiked knockdown on airborne opponents

moves.name: Jump LK
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump MK
moves.notes: Cross-up

moves.name: Jump HK
moves.notes: Solid horizontal jump-in tool and can be used to air reset opponents after f+HK (leaping kick) juggles for a mix-up

moves.name: Elbow Drop
moves.notes: Not an Overhead

moves.name: Water Slicer Slide
moves.notes: Incredibly strong tool to bypass many projectiles even on reaction and getting combo conversions on Punish Counter

moves.name: Windmill Kick
moves.notes: Overhead

moves.name: Hisen Kick
moves.notes: Airborne on frames 18-32 (Forced Knockdown state)

moves.name: Bushin Prism Strikes 2
moves.notes: Launches opponent into a limited juggle state (can juggle afterwards with Tatsus) and has very high KDA for some oki setups (such as spray cans)

moves.name: Bushin Prism Strikes 3
moves.notes: Last hit (HK) spikes down opponent into a short OTG bounce state

moves.name: Bushin Hellchain 1
moves.notes: Keeps the opponent grounded and leaves Kimberly up close and +2 on Hit (can be good to maintain grounded pressure / mixups)

moves.name: Bushin Hellchain Throw
moves.notes: Throws opponent behind Kimberly (switches sides)

moves.name: Bushin Tiger Fangs
moves.notes: Launches opponent into a limited juggle state

moves.name: Ripcord Throw
moves.notes: Throw Loop: Walk forward manually timed mixup between throw/strike (not possible on mid-screen back-roll)

moves.name: Bell Ringer
moves.notes: Back Throw oki: Basic meaties but no meaty throw

moves.name: Drive Impact: Steadfast Strike
moves.notes: 2 hits of armor on frames 1-27

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Shapeless State
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-22 (frames 1-20 when used on wake-up as a Reversal)

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.notes: Parries all strikes and projectiles (high and low) from frame 1

moves.name: Drive Rush
moves.notes: Dashes forward and enhances the next normal used out of the Drive Rush with +4 extra hitstun / blockstun (some moves also get unique properties enhanced such as juggle state)

moves.name: LK Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne attacks on frames 5-11

moves.name: MK Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne attacks on frames 6-12

moves.name: HK Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne attacks on frames 7-13

moves.name: OD Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Invincible to airborne attacks on frames 1-11

moves.name: Aerial Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Only possible during a forward jump

moves.name: OD Aerial Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.notes: Only possible during a forward jump

moves.name: LP Vagabond Edge
moves.notes: Last active frame has quite a bit more range than the first two, making this easier to space out to hit on last active frame (this makes it safe on block and can give a combo extension)

moves.name: MP Vagabond Edge
moves.notes: Second hit only comes out on hit

moves.name: HP Vagabond Edge
moves.notes: Second hit only comes out on hit

moves.name: OD Vagabond Edge
moves.notes: Second hit only comes out on hit

moves.name: Sprint > Torso Cleaver
moves.notes: Extended legs are invincible to airborne strikes on frames 18-27 (not including the initial 8F of Run start-up)

moves.name: Sprint > Shadow Slide
moves.notes: Low profile and Projectile Invincible on her upper body on frames 6-21 (not including the initial 8F of Run start-up)

moves.name: Sprint > Neck Hunter
moves.notes: Overhead

moves.name: Sprint > Arc Step
moves.notes: Can only hit grounded opponents

moves.name: Arc Step > Bushin Hojin Kick
moves.notes: Not an Overhead

moves.name: Arc Step > Bushin Izuna Otoshi
moves.notes: Grabs standing and crouch

moves.name: OD Sprint > Torso Cleaver
moves.notes: Extended legs are invincible to airborne strikes on frames 14-23 (not including the initial 8F of Run start-up)

moves.name: OD Sprint > Shadow Slide
moves.notes: Projectile Invincible (except on the extended leg) on frames 4-19 (not including the 8F of Run start-up)

moves.name: OD Sprint > Neck Hunter
moves.notes: Overhead

moves.name: OD Sprint > Arc Step
moves.notes: Can only hit grounded opponents

moves.name: OD Arc Step > Bushin Hojin Kick
moves.notes: Not an Overhead

moves.name: OD Arc Step > Bushin Izuna Otoshi
moves.notes: Grabs standing and crouch

moves.name: Shuriken Bomb
moves.notes: Kimberly places a Spray Can on frame 18 that explodes after 122F (LP/L) | 124F (MP/M) | 128F (HP/H) total frames

moves.name: Shuriken Bomb Spread
moves.notes: Kimberly places two different Spray Cans on frame 18 whose overall explosion start-up depends on their button strength; 122F (LP) | 124F (MP) | 128F (HP) total frames

moves.name: Nue Twister
moves.notes: Strike Throw (can be combo'd into)

moves.name: OD Nue Twister
moves.notes: Strike Throw (can be combo'd into)

moves.name: Bushin Beats (0 stock)
moves.notes: Strike and Throw invincible on frames 1-12

moves.name: Bushin Beats (1 stock)
moves.notes: Gains +400 bonus damage and higher KDA (better oki) than regular version

moves.name: Bushin Scramble
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frame 1 only (during screen freeze)

moves.name: Soaring Bushin Scramble (air)
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frame 1 only (during screen freeze)

moves.name: Bushin Ninjastar Cypher
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-13

moves.name: Bushin Ninjastar Cypher (Critical Art)
moves.notes: Fully invincible on frames 1-13
